channel.title: Csds on MASE To Dos
channel.description: Recent content in Csds on MASE To Dos

item.title: Tuesday, November 11, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Add new vocab and code to your T-Chart Work through the levels in Lesson 4 of Code.org Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 7, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Add your new vocab to your T-chart Complete levels 1-5 of Lesson 3 as a class Work through the rest of the bubbles independently Make sure you’ve met all the requirements on Level 9! If there is time, work on the Lesson 3 Extras Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, November 5, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Check out the drawing tool on Level 2 of Lesson 2 in Code.org Follow along during the drawing activity Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, November 4, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Think: What is your favorite form of entertainment? Complete the Activity Guide Turn in your Activity Guide Take a look at the animations and games in levels 3-6 on Code.org Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket
